vulnerability.name: USN-3995-2
vulnerability.description: USN-3995-1 fixed a vulnerability in keepalived. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Keepalived incorrectly handled certain HTTP status  response codes. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Keepalived  to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary  code.

statements.status_notes: Keepalived could be made to crash or run programs if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
